oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George Hamilton IV Performance - Tape 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 5 of 7. Multiple recordings of George Hamilton IV and the Country Gentlemen (performance group) on an unknown date. The recordings took place at Ampar Records and Bell Sound Studios Inc.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Aura Lee (George Hamilton IV) -- (02:35) Since You've Been Gone (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (05:13) I Would Not Change for Thy (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (07:56) Love's Old Sweet Song (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (10:09) Carolina Moon (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (13:08) You Tell Me Your Dreams (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (15:35) When I Grow Too Old to Dream -- (18:53) Let Me Call You Sweetheart (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (21:33) House of Gold (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (25:18) I Can't Help It (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen) -- (28:26) How Can You Refuse Him Now (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hamilton, George, IV, 1937-;
